column1: Does the founder hold an advanced degree from a prestigious institution?
Has the founder previously held a C-level role at a public tech company?
Did the founder co-found their company as part of a small team?
Has the founder received significant media recognition or press coverage?
Does the founder have experience in the healthcare sector?
Has the founder's previous startup been acquired?
Did the founder complete a degree in a technical field?
Has the founder worked full-time at a large number of companies?
Is the founder based in California?
Does the founder have experience in investment banking or financial services?
